official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require applicants for Federal student financial assistance to prove a minimum level of academic achievement before receiving such assistance.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require applicants for Federal student financial assistance to prove a minimum level of academic achievement before receiving such assistance.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require applicants for Federal student financial assistance to prove a minimum level of academic achievement before receiving such assistance.
